item.title: Unlocking New Markets
item.description: Foreign market expansion provides opportunities for growth and profit but involves risks. Engaging in long-term collaborations with local companies helps to overcome these challenges, complementing sales channels and unlocking inaccessible markets.

item.title: Partnerships in a VUCA World
item.description: The modern volatile, uncertain, complex, and ambiguous business landscape prompts many businesses to explore cross-border alliances for competitiveness and sales. These partnerships often involve distant, international partners, adding complexity to the endeavor, but the benetits are plenty if done right.

item.title: International Expansion, how to prepare
item.description: Expanding a business internationally comes with inherent risks and challenges that must be carefully considered and planned for. To prepare for these risks, it’s important to conduct thorough market research, seek legal and financial counsel, develop scalable operations, and carefully manage your brand’s reputation. By taking these steps, you can minimize risks and increase your chances of a successful international expansion
